DEPOSITS_GUARANTEES_REQUIRED.P: Guarantee for quality performance of the contract: Yes (5.00 %)

MAIN_FINANCING_CONDITIONS.P: Not less than 90 days, after submissions invoice for successful delivery

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: — statement of the economic operator that in the last five years he has not been pronounced a final verdict for participation in a criminal organization, corruption, fraud or money laundering,
— confirmation that no bankruptcy procedure has been initiated by a competent authority,
— confirmation that no liquidation procedure has been initiated by a competent authority,
— confirmation of paid taxes, contributions and other public fees from the competent authority of the country where the economic operator is registered,
— a certificate from the Registry of penalties for committed criminal acts of legal entities that it has not been pronounced secondary,
Penalty ban on participation in public call procedures, awarding public procurement contracts and contracts for Public-Private Partnership,

— a certificate from the Registry r of penalties for committed criminal acts of legal entities that it has not been pronounced secondary punishment temporary or permanent ban on performing a particular activity,
— confirmation that a final verdict has not imposed a misdemeanor sanction - a ban on performing profession, activity or duty, that is, a temporary ban on performing a particular activity,
— a document for registered activity - a form of a DRD or a certificate for registered activity. The solution for wholesale of medicines in accordance with the Law on Medicines and Medical Devices.

T_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: — the Economic operator for the offered goods shall have an Approval for placing the finished drug on the market or temporary or permanent authorization for parallel imports, according to the Law on Medicines and Medical Devices.
— the Economic operator shall have a document allowing imports (Approval for Intervention Import) under the Law on Medicines and Medical Devices.

T_CAPACITY_MIN_LEVEL.P: — approval for placing the finished drug on the market or temporary or permanent authorization for parallel imports, according to the Law on Medicines and Medical Devices.
— import approval (Approval for Intervention Import) according to the Law on Medicines and Medical Devices.

USE_ELECTRONIC_AUCTION.P: Electronic auction will be held as a final stage in this procurement process

EXISTENCE_AUTHORISED_PERSONS.P: Additional information about authorized persons and opening procedure:
— all bidders must bring a letter of authorization so that can be present and also so that can state remarks at the opening of the tender.
— the bids are submitted electronically and do not have an obligatory presence at the opening.
